summary: EVERY TIME I FILL THE GAS TANK, THE CAR SMELLS HEAVILY OF GAS FUMES FOR DAYS. I WAS TOLD IT IS A LEAK FROM THE TOP OF THE GAS TANK, AND THE MECHANIC TOLD ME HE HAS SEEN THIS A LOT WITH THIS MODEL/YEAR OF CORVETTES. IT'S CAUSED MY FUEL ECONOMY TO DROP, AND MY FUEL GAUGE WILL SOMETIMES SHUT OFF COMPLETELY.
